verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) To Thee, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> I call; <S%H7121><s%> My rock, <S%H6697><s%> do not be deaf <S%H2790><s%> to me, Lest, <S%H6435><s%> if Thou be silent <S%H2814><s%> to me, I become <S%H4911><s%> like <S%H4911><s%> those who go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit. <S%H953><s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications <S%H8469><s%> when I cry <S%H7768><s%> to Thee for help, <S%H7768><s%> When I lift <S%H5375><s%> up my hands <S%H3027><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> Thy holy <S%H6944><s%> sanctuary. <S%H1687><s%>

Do not drag <S%H4900><s%> me away <S%H4900><s%> with the wicked <S%H7563><s%> And with those who work <S%H6466><s%> iniquity; <S%H205><s%> Who speak <S%H1696><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> with their neighbors, <S%H7453><s%> While evil <S%H9567><s%> is in their hearts. <S%H3824><s%>

Requite <S%H5414><s%> them according to their work <S%H6467><s%> and according to the evil <S%H7455><s%> of their practices; <S%H4611><s%> Requite <S%H5414><s%> them according to the deeds <S%H4639><s%> of their hands; <S%H3027><s%> Repay <S%H7725><s%> them their recompense. <S%H1576><s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> they do not regard <S%H995><s%> the works <S%H6468><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> the deeds <S%H4639><s%> of His hands, <S%H3027><s%> He will tear <S%H2040><s%> them down <S%H2040><s%> and not build <S%H1129><s%> them up.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> He has heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplication. <S%H8469><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is my strength <S%H5797><s%> and my shield; <S%H4043><s%> My heart <S%H3820><s%> trusts <S%H982><s%> in Him, and I am helped; <S%H5826><s%> Therefore my heart <S%H3820><s%> exults, <S%H5937><s%> And with my song <S%H7892><s%> I shall thank <S%H3034><s%> Him.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is their strength, <S%H5797><s%> And He is a saving <S%H3444><s%> defense <S%H4581><s%> to His anointed. <S%H4899><s%>

Save <S%H3467><s%> Thy people, <S%H5971><s%> and bless <S%H1288><s%> Thine inheritance; <S%H5159><s%> Be their shepherd <S%H7462><s%> also, and carry <S%H5375><s%> them forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>
